enroll:
Digital Textbook Fee of $65
Level 1 CCP course
EM test administered by the Office of Testing
GE Quantitative Reasoning: Math and Logical Anly
Ohio Transfer 36 - Math, Statistics, and Logic
description: Spreadsheet and database modeling/programming concepts and techniques to solve business related problems; efficient/effective data handling, computational analysis and decision support. Additional topics: computer concepts, networking, project integration.Prereq: Math 1130 or above, or Math Placement Level L. Not open to students with credit for 1111 or 1112. This course is available for EM credit. GE quant reason math and logical anly course.
